items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: The proof type is a utility bill issued by London City Utilities, valid until 2023-12-31.
Ellipro survey scores available for 2020, 2021, and 2022 with validated financial data.
Bank account and SWIFT details are verified; address matches organization headquarters.
No supplementary data available regarding verification of identity documents for company directorship.
Renewal/additional information required for some tax documents; no specific supplementary details provided.
Industry license and environmental compliance under review; supplementary data highlights medium risk levels but no resolution status.
Operates globally with a significant international presence and key workforce attributes.
No data available regarding PEP screening.
Reported total net revenue of 158.1 billion USD for the year ended December 31, 2023.
No information provided on market capitalization.
